alert.note: Alert for Inland Flagler (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 28 at 2:53PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT WEST CENTRAL FLAGLER AND SOUTHEASTERN PUTNAM COUNTIES THROUGH 345 PM EDT... At 252 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm capable of producing a landspout near Crescent City, moving northwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Landspouts and wind gusts around 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Crescent City, Pomona Park, Andalusia, Fruitland, Satsuma, Welaka, Lake Como, and Georgetown. LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
